tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClinicalTrials (
 trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trial_name VARCHAR(255),
 treatment VARCHAR(255),
 duration_weeks INT,
 participants INT,
 efficacy_rating FLOAT,
 safety_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    efficacy_score FLOAT,
    safety_rating INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_drug_id FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
  trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(255),
  enrollment_count INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id UUID REFERENCES clinical_trials(trial_id),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  health_condition VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id UUID REFERENCES clinical_trials(trial_id),
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
  effectiveness_score FLOAT,
  side_effects VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  diagnosis VARCHAR,
  registration_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE treatments (treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR,
  dosage FLOAT,
  duration INT,
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE trials (trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR,
  phase INT,
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE results (result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id UUID,
  patient_id UUID,
  treatment_id UUID,
  outcome VARCHAR,
  result_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage FLOAT,
  duration INT,
  side_effects VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  lead_researcher VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE TrialResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  outcome VARCHAR(50)
);
